Key Arguments: The bill communicates distrust in the public's ability to discern truth.
The legislation is undemocratic and creates an 'us and them' mentality.
The public should be trusted to exercise critical thinking skills.
No one, including the government, can be the sole source of truth.
Notable Quotes: The proposed ‘Misinformation Bill’ is a disaster.
Such an ‘us and them’ mentality is undemocratic and will prove devastating for our country.
No one is able to be the sole source of truth, only God is and most definitely not a group of unelected bureaucrats in Canberra.
